net.sourceforge.metrics.core.sources
Class AbstractMetricSource

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.metrics.core.sources.AbstractMetricSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CompilationUnitMetrics, MethodMetrics, PackageFragmentMetrics, PackageFragmentRootMetrics, ProjectMetrics, TypeMetrics
public abstract class AbstractMetricSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements Constants, java.io.Serializable

Base class for all metric sources. Used by calculators to retrieve the AST, IJavaElement, etc. and to store their results.

Author:
Frank Sauer
See Also:
Serialized Form

setValue

public void setValue(Metric value)
Used by Calculators to store their result metrics. As a side effect, adds a marker of type net.sourceforge.metrics.outofrangemarker if enabled and the value is out of the range indicated by the metric's descriptor

getOriginalCompilationUnit

public static org.eclipse.jdt.core.ICompilationUnit getOriginalCompilationUnit(org.eclipse.jdt.core.IJavaElement input)
get the original compilation unit for the given IJavaElement. If the compilation unit turns out to be a WorkingCopy this method returns its original source compilation unit

Returns:
ICompilationUnit
